articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: ‘A first’ from Mars: European spacecraft sends livestream from red planet - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times.
